//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "para_truck", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_MOVE_BY", "512.0 0.0 0.0 5000.0" );

	affect ( "para_wave_guy", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
	{
		set ( "SET_ANIM_SEQUENCER", "OFF" );
		set ( "SET_SEARCH_OFF", "DEFAULT" );

		loop ( 4 )
		{

			task ( "signaling truck" )
			{
				set ( "SET_ANIM", "Body|Script|Full+None+Normal+Stand|Signal back up truck" );
			}

			dowait ( "signaling truck" );
		}

	}

}
